column4: Hey, im setting up a NFS - and it says to mount to "/locale/ubuntu" is that /usr/local?
you could use whatever you want
cp -a
try: cp -a -- * /media/HDD
have u even been paying attention?
no, that's the point.

it's better to just repeat your question after a reasonable amount of time if no one can help you.  You're more likely to get help that way.  Some people may have just joined and have no clue about what you are talking about
its better to ask = what r u having issues with, not send an ubottu bot after me because ur not paying attention.

i've been working llutz and TJ- on my issue for a WHILE - im not going to just rudely pretend they arent helping and ask someone else for new help. Im just saying if anyone else that is listen has an idea... to chime in.
ask ##windows how to install win8 via usb
yea- but they dont support ubuntu
so you know how to install win8 via usb?
all the instructions go with some windows exe software
have you tried just dd'ing the iso you have of win8 to your usb stick device...?
no- and i dont think thatll work.
why...?
here's a question about win7: http://superuser.com/questions/223560/how-to-create-a-windows-7-installation-usb-from-linux-or-mac
i dont have a win7 iso
I know.
you should read the suggestions for win7 and then try to apply the same to your current situation imho
advice taken-
